text: Success is not final, failure is not fatal: it is the courage to continue that counts.
author: Winston Churchill

text: The only limit to our realization of tomorrow is our doubts of today.
author: Franklin D. Roosevelt

text: It does not matter how slowly you go as long as you do not stop.
author: Confucius

text: Success is walking from failure to failure with no loss of enthusiasm.
author: Winston Churchill

text: The harder you work for something, the greater you'll feel when you achieve it.
author: Unknown

text: The best revenge is massive success.
author: Frank Sinatra

text: Now, is the right time to face your fear.
author: Public

text: The struggle you make, the challenges you face, the harsh you have gone through are going to pay you sometime
author: Public

text: Ease is a greater threat to progress than hardship
author: Denzel Washington

text: Fall Down seven times, get up eight
author: Japanese Proverb

text: Every failed experiment is one step closer to success
author: Thomas Edison

text: Success is not final; failure is not fatal
author: Winston Churchill

text: I can accept failure; everyone fails at something. But I can't accept not trying.
author: Michael Jordan

text: It is not the size of the dog in the fight but the size of the fight in the dog
author: Mark Twain

text: There are some people that will never fail they are called Dead people, if you are not dead try and fail
author: Fikru

text: You have to decide how you feel, No matter the circumstances
author: Stoic Philosophy

text: At the end of pain there is success
author: Public

text: The smoothest rock is in the roughest part of the stream
author: Public

text: You don't know Tall until you know short, you don't know happy unless you know sad, you don't know sunny days unless you see cloudy days, you don't know success unless you know failure
author: Fearless Soul

text: Your problems are there to sharpen you
author: Frederick Douglass

text: Learn from your failure and Try Again
author: Public

text: Patience can win you more
author: Public

text: What comes easy won't last, what lasts won't come easy
author: Public

text: Prove you are stronger
author: Public

text: Respect yourself enough to walk away from anyone or anything that no longer serves you, grows you, or Makes you happy
author: Public

text: Ignore people who laugh at you when you try, remember that they won't repeat it when you succeed
author: Public

text: Don't say I won't succeed, What if you do?
author: Public

text: We've all got something about ourselves, we wish we could change but it's completely out of our control. The only thing we can control is how we deal with it, and the way I see it, we have two choices: We can lay low, or we can stand Tall
author: Public

text: Failure Lies in your attitude
author: Public

text: He who has conquered Fear and Doubt has conquered Failure
author: James Allen

text: At the point of Maximum danger, is the point of minimum Fear
author: Bruce Lee

text: The confrontation with Fear is the Magical way of facing the things we have to do in this life
author: Public

text: Failure is simply the opportunity to begin again this time more intelligently
author: Henry Ford

text: Don't think what would happen if you fail! Think, what if you fly?
author: Public

text: You are allowed to scream, You are allowed to cry, BUT do not give up
author: Public

text: Next to trying and winning, the next best thing is trying and failing
author: Napoleon Hill

text: A diamond is a chunk of carbon that did well under pressure
author: Henry Kissinger

text: If you saw the size of the blessing coming, then you would understand the magnitude of the battle you are fighting
author: Public

text: We must embrace Pain and Burn as fuel for our journey
author: Kenji Miyazawa

text: KEEP GOING
author: Public

text: Doubt kills more dreams than failure will ever will
author: Suzy Kassem

text: Keep your head up, keep your chin up, stand Tall and walk like you are going to nail it
author: Public

text: By perseverance the snail reached the ark.
author: Charles Haddon Spurgeon

text: The only thing we have to fear is fear itself - nameless, unreasoning, unjustified terror which paralyzes needed efforts to convert retreat into advance.
author: Franklin D. Roosevelt

text: Put an eagle in a cage and it will bite the bars, whether they be of iron or glod.
author: IBSEN

text: Difficulties show me what they are. In case of any difficulty remember that God has pitted you against a rougn antagonist that you may be a conqueror, and this cannot be without toil.
author: Epictetus

text: The fisherme know that the sea is dangerous and the storm terrible, but they have never found these dangers sufficient reason for remaining ashore.
author: Vincent Van Gogh

text: When you get into a tight place and everything goes against you, till it seems as though you could not hold on a minute longer, never give up then, for that is just the place and time that the tide will turn.
author: Harriet Beecher Stowe

text: Accept the challenges so that you may feel the exhilaration of victory
author: General George S.Patton

text: Refuse to be average. Let your heart soar as high as it will.
author: A.W. Tozer
